name: A Warmer Shade of Summer (itch)
description:
A Warmer Shade of Summer is a Visual Novel by 52.6 Productions:

Also available on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1639580/A_Warmer_Shade_of_Summer/

You haven't been back to your grandfathers farm in years. Now two years into your college experience, it's time for a little break. 


Summer is here! And there's no other town on earth like Summerset. The sun, the beach, the people.

Who knows what you’ll find there?  That special someone? An old friend? Maybe you’ll learn something about yourself. Or find out who you were all along.


Creator, Writer, Programmer: Alex Braden

Co-programmer: Logan Pike

Character Sprites: Rizuchi

Backgrounds: Necromew

Illustrations: Duafebruari and Rizuchi

A Warmer Shade of Summer is a full visual novel that is 100% free. 

Any donation of over $5 will unlock the Behind the Scenes pack. An in-depth look at the production of the game that comes with high-resolution versions of the illustrations, and backgrounds for use in Wallpapers and Fan Art.

This game contains mature themes and is not suitable for children.
